nodes.text: The scoop skimmer, also known as a scoop speeder was an airspeeder used on Utapau as a transport and law enforcement vessel.

Green-hulled scoop skimmers were designed for use by Pau'ans, and the passenger compartment could seat four. Although chiefly used as transports, some were equipped with light blaster cannons for law enforcement duties. They appeared somewhat similar in design to the Techno Union Mankvim-814 light interceptor.
Besides Utapau, Scoop skimmers could also be found in the skies of Galactic City on Coruscant.
